    static float getDistance​(lejos.hardware.sensor.EV3UltrasonicSensor ultrasonicSensor)
    Returns the distance in meters.

    Code Example:
    //Creates an Objekt of the class EV3UltrasonicSensor that is connected to
    //an EV3UltrasonicSensor at Port 3
    EV3UltrasonicSensor ultrasonicSensor = new EV3UltrasonicSensor(SensorPort.S3);
    //lieÃŸt den Abstand des Sensors aus.

    • getDistance

      public static float getDistance​(lejos.hardware.sensor.EV3UltrasonicSensor ultrasonicSensor)
      Returns the distance in meters.

      Code Example:
      //Creates an Objekt of the class EV3UltrasonicSensor that is connected to
      //an EV3UltrasonicSensor at Port 3
      EV3UltrasonicSensor ultrasonicSensor = new EV3UltrasonicSensor(SensorPort.S3);
      //lieÃŸt den Abstand des Sensors aus.
      float distance = ElementSorterHelper.getDistance(ultrasonicSensor);
      Parameters:
      ultrasonicSensor - , an EV3UltrasonicSensor object that is connected to any Sensor Port
      Returns:
      the distance measured by EV3UltrasonicSensor
